moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.effect: Has a chance (50%) of lowering the target’s Defense by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: X Attack All
moves.effect: Raises the Attack of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Gloves Off!
moves.effect: Raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank. Applies the Sure Hit Next effect to all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Drain Punch
moves.effect: The more damage dealt to the target, the more this move restores the user’s HP.

passives.name: On the Ropes 3
passives.description: Reduces damage when the user is hit by a physical attack move while in a pinch.
